net.cwroethel.swt.popupcalendar
Class TodaySelectorStyleAdapter

java.lang.Object
  net.cwroethel.swt.popupcalendar.DateChooserStyle
      net.cwroethel.swt.popupcalendar.TodaySelectorStyle
          net.cwroethel.swt.popupcalendar.TodaySelectorStyleAdapter

public class TodaySelectorStyleAdapter
extends TodaySelectorStyle

Adapter for simple customization of the 'today' button. Since there is only one component in this panel there no switch or if clause is required to specify the component. Just override the overrideStyle class, e.g. 

 PopupCalendar.setTodaySelectorStyle (new TodaySelectorStyleAdapter() {
    public void overrideStyle(Control control, int style) {
       control.setBackground(Display.getCurrent().getSystemColor(SWT.COLOR_GRAY));
    }
 });

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $
Author:
W. Roethel, http://www.cwroethel.net

Method Detail

overrideStyle

public void overrideStyle(Control component,
                          int style)
Method invoked after the default settings are applied to the todya button. To override the button style, just specify the attributes for components. Remember that the Today button is a Button, so it may be necessary to type case in order to apply an attribute, e.g. ((Button) component).setText("blabla") .

Overrides:
overrideStyle in class DateChooserStyle
Parameters:
component - Control
style - int
